channel.title: Softlayer_product_item_requirement on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_product_item_requirement on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Requirement
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Requirement Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Product_Item_Requirement data type contains information relating to what requirements, if any, exist for an item. The requiredItemId local property is the item id that is required. seeAlso SoftLayer_Product_Conflict Local id Identifier for this record. Type: integer itemId This is the id of the item affected by the requirement. Type: integer message This is a custom message to display to the user when this requirement shortfall arises.
